item.title: Analyzing the NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament Field of 68
item.description: I just returned from an event in Las Vegas, which intentionally coincided with the first weekend of the NCAA Men’s Basketball Tournament. In preparation, I attempted to analyze the 68 tournament NCAA Tournament teams, hoping to make a few profitable predictions. I went in with low expectations, thanks in part to statistics posts about how difficult it is to profit, even with better-than-the-bookmaker’s odds. I ended up breaking even. Here are a few of the plots I created using data from two Ken’s: Pomeroy’s Kenpom.
